mapper.select:
select INV.MB001, INV.MB002, INV.MB003, INV.MB009, INV.MB017, CMS.MC002, CMS.MC005 from INVMB as INV join CMSMC as CMS on MB017 = MC001
AND INV.MB001 like concat('%',#{invmb_entity.mb001,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND INV.MB002 like concat('%',#{invmb_entity.mb002,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND INV.MB003 like concat('%',#{invmb_entity.mb003,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND CMS.MC005 ='Y'
order by INV.MB001 asc ${erp_limit}

SELECT inv.MC001, inv.MC002, cms.MC002 as CMC002, inv.MC003, inv.MC007, inv.MC004, inv.MC012, inv.MC013 FROM INVMC as inv join CMSMC as cms on inv.MC002 = cms.MC001
AND inv.MC001 like concat('%',#{invmc_entity.mc001,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by inv.MC001 asc OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY

select bom.MD001, bom.MD003, inv.MB002, inv.MB003, bom.MD006, bom.MD009, bom.MD011, bom.MD012, (bom.MD015+' '+bom.MD201+' '+ bom.MD202+' '+bom.MD203+' '+ bom.MD204+' '+bom.MD205+' '+ bom.MD206+' '+bom.MD207) as MD015, bom.MD016 from BOMMD as bom join INVMB as inv on bom.MD003 = inv.MB001
bom.MD006 != 0
AND bom.MD001 like concat('%',#{bommd_entity.md001,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by bom.MD003 asc OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 500 ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CTB.TB003 AS S000, '預計領' AS TP000, SMC.MC002 AS TP001, SMC.MC001 AS TP002, CTB.TB015 AS TP003, CONVERT(varchar(100),CTB.TB004) AS TP004, '' AS TP005, ''+CTB.TB001+'-'+CTB.TB003+' : '+CTB.TB014 AS NOTE000 FROM MOCTB AS CTB join CMSMC AS SMC on CTB.TB009 = SMC.MC001 join MOCTA AS CTA on CTA.TA001+CTA.TA002 = CTB.TB001+CTB.TB002
AND CTB.TB003 like concat('%',#{mocpur_entity.s000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CTA.TA011 !='y' OR CTA.TA011 !='Y' ) AND CTA.TA013 = 'Y' AND CTB.TB004 > 0
ORDER BY CTB.TB015 ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY UNION SELECT CTA.TA006 AS S000, '預計生' AS TP000, SMC.MC002 AS TP001, SMC.MC001 AS TP002, CTA.TA010 AS TP003, '' AS TP004, CONVERT(varchar(100),CTA.TA015) AS TP005, ''+CTA.TA001+'-'+CTA.TA002+' : '+CTA.TA026+'-'+CTA.TA027 AS NOTE000 FROM MOCTA AS CTA join CMSMC AS SMC on CTA.TA020 = SMC.MC001
AND CTA.TA006 like concat('%',#{mocpur_entity.s000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CTA.TA011 !='y' OR CTA.TA011 !='Y' ) AND CTA.TA013 = 'Y'
ORDER BY CTA.TA010 ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY UNION SELECT RTD.TD004 AS S000, '預計購' AS TP000, SMC.MC002 AS TP001, SMC.MC001 AS TP002, RTD.TD012 AS TP003, '' AS TP004, CONVERT(varchar(100),RTD.TD008) AS TP005, ''+RTD.TD001+'-'+RTD.TD002+' : '+RTD.TD005 AS NOTE000 FROM PURTD AS RTD join CMSMC AS SMC on RTD.TD007 = SMC.MC001 join PURTC AS RTC on RTD.TD001 +RTD.TD002 =RTC.TC001 +RTC.TC002
AND RTD.TD004 like concat('%',#{mocpur_entity.s000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND RTD.TD015 !=RTD.TD008 AND (RTC.TC027 !='3' OR RTC.TC027='N') AND RTD.TD018 ='Y'
ORDER BY RTD.TD012 ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY ) AS MOC_PUR ORDER BY S000 ASC, TP003 ASC ,TP000 ASC
